secondary_intents.name: Greetings
secondary_intents.description: When a customer gives greetings only like Hi, hello, good morning etc.

secondary_intents.name: Acknowledgment
secondary_intents.description: When a customer gives acknowledgment only like Ok, Thanks, Got it, Alright etc.

secondary_intents.name: Contact Details
secondary_intents.description: When a customer asks about dealership contact information, location, or hours.

secondary_intents.name: About Services
secondary_intents.description: When a customer asks about services offered by the dealership.

secondary_intents.name: Vehicle Specifications
secondary_intents.description: When customer asks about vehicle specs like engine, horsepower, fuel economy, dimensions.

secondary_intents.name: Vehicle Features
secondary_intents.description: When customer asks about features like safety tech, infotainment, comfort options.

secondary_intents.name: Pricing
secondary_intents.description: When customer asks about vehicle pricing, MSRP, or cost.

secondary_intents.name: Availability
secondary_intents.description: When customer asks about vehicle availability, stock, or inventory.

secondary_intents.name: Colors & Options
secondary_intents.description: When customer asks about available colors, trims, or customization options.

secondary_intents.name: Vehicle Comparison
secondary_intents.description: When customer wants to compare different models or brands.

secondary_intents.name: Schedule Test Drive
secondary_intents.description: When customer wants to schedule or book a test drive.

secondary_intents.name: Test Drive Inquiry
secondary_intents.description: When customer has questions about test drive process, requirements, or availability.

secondary_intents.name: Financing Options
secondary_intents.description: When customer asks about loan options, interest rates, or financing terms.

secondary_intents.name: Lease Options
secondary_intents.description: When customer asks about leasing a vehicle.

secondary_intents.name: Trade-In Valuation
secondary_intents.description: When customer wants to trade in their current vehicle.

secondary_intents.name: Payment Methods
secondary_intents.description: When customer asks about accepted payment methods.

secondary_intents.name: Incentives & Rebates
secondary_intents.description: When customer asks about current offers, rebates, or incentives.

secondary_intents.name: Order Status
secondary_intents.description: When customer wants to check the status of their vehicle order.

secondary_intents.name: Delivery Timeline
secondary_intents.description: When customer asks about delivery or pickup timeline.

secondary_intents.name: Documentation Required
secondary_intents.description: When customer asks about required documents for purchase.

secondary_intents.name: Vehicle Reservation
secondary_intents.description: When customer wants to reserve or hold a vehicle.

secondary_intents.name: Schedule Service
secondary_intents.description: When customer wants to book a service appointment.

secondary_intents.name: Service Inquiry
secondary_intents.description: When customer has questions about maintenance or repairs.

secondary_intents.name: Warranty Information
secondary_intents.description: When customer asks about warranty coverage or terms.

secondary_intents.name: Parts & Accessories
secondary_intents.description: When customer asks about vehicle parts or accessories.

secondary_intents.name: Vehicle Registration
secondary_intents.description: When customer has questions about registration process.

secondary_intents.name: Insurance
secondary_intents.description: When customer asks about insurance options or requirements.

secondary_intents.name: Owner Manual & Resources
secondary_intents.description: When customer needs help finding owner manual or vehicle resources.

secondary_intents.name: Complaint or Issue
secondary_intents.description: When customer has a complaint or issue with their vehicle or service.

customer_messages.current_human_message: Hi, I'm interested in the new SUV models
What's the fuel economy on the 2024 Sedan?

customer_messages.history: human: Do you have the red color available? - ai: Yes, we have the 2024 Sedan available in Crimson Red. Would you like to schedule a test drive?
customer_messages.current_human_message: Yes, when can I come in?
Can I trade in my 2018 Honda Civic?
What financing options do you have?

customer_messages.history: human: I ordered a vehicle last month - ai: I can help you check the status. Can you provide your order number or name on the order?

customer_messages.current_human_message: I need to schedule an oil change
Does this model have adaptive cruise control?
What's the difference between the LX and EX trim?
Are there any current rebates or incentives?

customer_messages.history: human: I'm looking for a family SUV - ai: Great! We have several SUV options perfect for families. The Explorer and Highlander are very popular. What's most important to you - space, fuel efficiency, or features?
customer_messages.current_human_message: I need three rows of seating
What documents do I need to bring to purchase?
How much is the 2024 Hybrid model?
Can I test drive this weekend?

customer_messages.history: human: I want to lease a vehicle - ai: Excellent choice! Leasing offers lower monthly payments and flexibility. Are you interested in a specific model?

customer_messages.current_human_message: Do you have this model in stock?
Can I put a deposit to hold this car?
What safety features does this have?

customer_messages.history: human: My check engine light is on - ai: I'm sorry to hear that. We should get that checked right away. Would you like to schedule a diagnostic appointment?

customer_messages.current_human_message: How do I register my new vehicle?
Compare the sedan vs the coupe model
What's the horsepower on the V6 engine?

customer_messages.history: human: I received my car yesterday - ai: Congratulations on your new vehicle! How can I assist you today?
customer_messages.current_human_message: Where can I find the owner's manual online?
Can I customize the interior color?

customer_messages.history: human: I need new tires - ai: We can definitely help with that. What vehicle do you have?

customer_messages.current_human_message: What's included in the 30,000 mile service?
How long does delivery take after ordering?
Do you have certified pre-owned vehicles?
What's the ground clearance on the SUV?

customer_messages.history: human: My car is making a strange noise - ai: That's concerning. Can you describe the noise and when it happens?
customer_messages.current_human_message: It's a grinding sound when I brake
Are there any special college graduate programs?
What's the cargo space in cubic feet?
Can I get remote start installed?

customer_messages.history: human: I want to buy - ai: Wonderful! Let me help you find the perfect vehicle. What type are you interested in?

customer_messages.current_human_message: How much is my 2015 Camry worth?
What's the monthly payment for 60 months?

customer_messages.history: human: I need to cancel my service appointment - ai: I can help with that. Can you provide your appointment date and name?

customer_messages.current_human_message: What colors does the truck come in?

customer_messages.history: human: I'm having trouble with the Bluetooth - ai: I'm sorry to hear that. Have you tried restarting your phone and the vehicle's system?

customer_messages.current_human_message: Do you offer loaner cars during service?
What's the cheapest model you have?
Can I order a vehicle that's not in stock?
What's the bed length on the pickup truck?
Do you buy cars for cash?
Is there a waiting list for this model?

customer_messages.history: human: Thanks for your help! - ai: You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with?
human: I'm interested in the hybrid - ai: Great choice! The hybrid offers excellent fuel economy. Would you like to know more about the specs or schedule a test drive?

customer_messages.current_human_message: Can I bring my dog to the test drive?
Do you have midnight blue in the luxury trim?
How long is the test drive?
Can I get winter tires installed?

customer_messages.history: human: My airbag light came on - ai: That's a safety concern we need to address immediately. Can you bring the vehicle in today?
customer_messages.current_human_message: What time are you open until?
Do I need an appointment for service?
Can I test drive multiple vehicles?
What's the difference between AWD and 4WD?
How often should I change the oil?

customer_messages.history: human: I just bought a car from you - ai: Congratulations! We're so happy to have you as a customer. How can I help you today?
customer_messages.current_human_message: How do I set up the mobile app?
Can I get a price quote via email?
Do you have a parts department?
Is the sunroof panoramic or regular?
Can I pay with a check?
What's your best SUV for off-roading?

customer_messages.history: human: My key fob isn't working - ai: That's frustrating. It might just need a new battery. Would you like to come in and we can check it?

customer_messages.current_human_message: What audio system does it have?

customer_messages.history: human: I want to upgrade my stereo - ai: We can definitely help with that! Our service department does custom audio installations. What are you looking for?

customer_messages.current_human_message: Do you have a loyalty program?
Can I bring someone with me to test drive?
What's the cost of extended warranty?

customer_messages.history: human: I need to update my contact information - ai: I can help with that. What information needs to be updated?

customer_messages.current_human_message: Is there a convenience package available?
Can I finance with bad credit?
Is there a hybrid version of this model?

customer_messages.history: human: I'm moving and need to transfer my service - ai: No problem! Where are you moving to? I can help you find a dealership in your new area.

customer_messages.current_human_message: What's the headroom in the back seat?
Do you offer scratch and dent repair?
Can I get heated seats installed?
What's the total cost out the door?
Do you have shuttle service during repairs?
Can I transfer my warranty to a new owner?

customer_messages.history: human: I got a recall notice - ai: Thank you for letting us know. We'll get that taken care of right away. Can you provide your VIN number?
customer_messages.current_human_message: Do I need to pay for recall work?
What's the difference between Sport and Touring?
Can I get a vehicle history report?
Do you have demo vehicles for sale?
Is there a fee for test drives?

customer_messages.history: human: I love the car but need to think about it - ai: Absolutely, take your time! This is a big decision. Can I answer any other questions to help you decide?
customer_messages.current_human_message: How long will this deal last?
Do you have WiFi hotspot capability?
Can I schedule a virtual tour?
What's included in the premium package?

customer_messages.history: human: My navigation system isn't working - ai: I'm sorry about that. Let's troubleshoot it. Is it not loading at all or is it showing an error?
customer_messages.current_human_message: It says map data is outdated
Can I get remote engine start?
Do you have electric charging stations?

customer_messages.history: human: I need to reschedule my appointment - ai: No problem! What date works better for you?

customer_messages.current_human_message: Do you offer tire rotation service?
Can I lease with no money down?

customer_messages.history: human: I saw a commercial about a special offer - ai: Great! We have several promotions running. Which model were you interested in?
human: The AC isn't blowing cold - ai: That's not good, especially in this weather. We should check the refrigerant. Can you bring it in this week?
customer_messages.current_human_message: How much does AC repair usually cost?
Is there a premium sound system?
Can I get a hitch installed?

customer_messages.history: human: I want to sell my car to you - ai: We're always interested in quality vehicles! What year, make, and model do you have?

customer_messages.current_human_message: Do you have a body shop?

customer_messages.history: human: My tire pressure light is on - ai: That happens sometimes with temperature changes. Do you know when you last checked your tire pressure?

customer_messages.current_human_message: Do you offer paintless dent repair?

customer_messages.history: human: Ok thanks - ai: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with today?
